data.title: Man: The Animated Series
data.text:
This article about a program needs to be expanded with more information.

Please help out by editing it.

Spider-Man: The Animated Series (1994â€“98) is an animated superhero action. It is the fourth animated series based on the Marvel Comics character Spider-Man. It aired on FOX as part of the Fox Kids programming block.
